divs: sighting detailsi have been watching the sky since an incident april 23 where i saw a blue object flash over my back yard apt. every night from at least 7-9 pm. i have recorded in a log at least 1-9 objects everyday since then, most are high up and only an amber light is seen crossing overhead and over mcarren airport and some like this one worth reporting as it defies the norms. first note that all the amber lights i have seen are just that, one light, no flashing or other colors ever in all my logging days. at 7:30pm i saw a dim amber white ball heading sw very high up, like a star. at 7:33pm i saw what looked like a shooting star going nw, but it looked like it was only approx. 100' up from me. . i made a note . at 8:07pm another ball appeared over my head heading e then instantly headed se with a ziggy motion for a few sec. then it dissapeared. i started to look elsewhere then a plane appeared there where there was none heading sw. made another note. then at 8:12 a bright semi-white ball shot a looong 5 sec.(1-1 thousand 2 ect) from my tree tops w (35' high) to the ne and 1\2 way across the sky over my apt. it was not as fast as a shooting star. it laft a trail behind it , like vapor with a few sparks. i couldn`t see the trail after it was gone.no sound. alas no picture, i tried but my phone camera is not fast enough. will invest in a good night film in an unopenable package for the future. if you would be interested in my log book i can send a copy. it starts on april 23- aug 12 sporatic siteings and from aug. 20 to date everyday from 7-9pm everyday, sometimes longer and as some mornings i can`t sleep so sit outside.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Pahrump
There were no other sightings in Pahrump on or around September 15th 2009
Summary: semi bright white ball or disc w/trail streaks across half the sky in 5 sec.
